name: Highway Rider Extreme
description: It's time to put on a helmet and ride your motorbike in this super fast racing game.  And remember your time per level is limited, so don't crash that will prevent you from reaching the finish line as fast as possible.  By collecting coins and dodging traffic following other vehicles close at hand to get an extra bonus for even longer driving time.  Buy upgrades and cool new bikes in the shop to race faster than ever.  Unlock daily bonus levels and try to complete the map with your high score
